hero-title: Stake, Earn, and Swap on the Chia Blockchain
hero-sub-title: Hashgreen brings the first decentralized liquidity staking and yield farming to you.
feature-stake_desc: Provide liquidity in Chia or asset tokens, and earn fees from swappers.
feature-yield_desc: Receive Hashgreen tokens by providing liquidity in top pools.
feature-protocol_desc: Be a Hashgreen token holder, and directly benefit from protocol growth.
roadmap-2023_Q1_2: AMM alpha testing on Chia testnet
roadmap-2023_Q2_2: AMM official launch on Chia mainnet
roadmap-2023_Q2_3: DAO staking alpha testing on Chia testnet
roadmap-2023_Q3_1: DAO staking official launch on Chia mainnet, enabling yield farming and protocol fee sharing
whitepaper-desc: HashgreenSwap exists to establish and develop more convenient transactions on Chia Network. This whitepaper will detail the considerations and analysis behind HashgreenSwap, and you are welcome to read it for further understanding.
community-discord_title: Join our Discord now to interact with the community!
community-discord_desc: Please share all your feelings here, so that we can create a better user experience for you!
community-twitter_desc: Follow the latest news from HashgreenSwap
community-medium_desc: Follow the latest news from HashgreenSwap
